name: Paper Cut (LawfulWaffle)
description:
A super simple game for the "Rock, Paper, Scissors" theme of Week 154 of the Weekly Game Jam. This is my first game and while I know I can improve on this I wanted to get something on itch and submitted just so I can say that I did.

Cut paper, not rock. Cutting rock will damage your blade. Cut a bunch of paper before you break your blade.

Move with A and D. Jump with W. Snip with Left Click. Perform the scared scissor art, the Big Cut, with Right Click. Esc to esc, R to restart.

I used some assets from the Kenney pack

Thanks for looking!

**Changelog

Players and enemies no longer get stuck in walls

Enemies change direction more often, specifically when they hit a wall
